item.title: Crashed damaged Abandoned vehicle on public road, 25th February
item.description:
The bonnet is badly crumpled and the vehicle appears undriveable. It has not moved for at least 2 months and appears abandoned. The vehicle is starting to look neglected and is causing concern due to its condition and location. The vehicle has been stationary in the same position for a long period of time and nobody has attended it. I believe it may be abandoned.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Will Crooks Gardens, Eltham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 13 Nelgarde Rd, 24th February
item.description:
Overflowing bins, fly tipped furniture blocking pavements. There’s multiple bags of rubbish tipping out into the street. Seems to be a recurring problem at no11 & no13. It’s attracting vermin and is a health threat.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 13, Nelgarde Road, Ladywell, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: LITTER NOT CLEANED FOR OVER ONE YEAR You keep closing, 24th February
item.description:
Hackney council I have reported this issue 5 times . Each time you have NOT RIVED THE LITTER but have illegally unjustifiably closed the report . This means you are falsely reporting the job has been completed when IT HAS Not .ILL write to the Ombudsman.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): De Beauvoir Estate, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Squatters in the flat 53 gayhurst hopwood road SE17 2BL for at least 4 months, 24th February
item.description:
There have been men going in and out of this property amd they use cable wires to lock the doors and open it back when they need to open it. At least 5 men with there delivery bikes previously had people check the property but they couldnt get in. They are gaining access via the back door downstairs in the garden then coming back out from the front entrance

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hopwood Road, Walworth, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: About 3/4 street lights are out on the even side of the road, 24th February
item.description:

item.title: Idling car for an hour, 24th February
item.description:
I live on the second floor and could hear the loud engine running for over an hour. This incident happened around 10 pm. It was extremely loud and disruptive in the evening.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 127-129, Cleveland Street, Fitzrovia, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overflowing bins means rubbish all over the street, 25th February
item.description:
These bins are consistently overflowing causing all the rubbish to spill onto the street. It’s everywhere and an absolute eyesore. Then we have flipping and poop to deal with and people urinating on the corner. Please fix these problems on our street.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Rippolson Road, Plumstead
Report on FixMyStreet
